title: Cant Connect To The CHAT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: Idk why it keep showing me there have an error in League, and CANT connect to CHAT!!!!

replies.body: There were chat server issues last night per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Make sure to bookmark that for updates.  Everything looks to be okay now, but let me know!
